title: British Pharmacopoeia
desc: Browse the official standards for medicines & pharmaceuticals. Built using our publication framework with a number of custom jQuery modules.

title: Tennis TV
desc: Home to live streaming of the ATP & WTA tour. Mobile first design.

title: Research Legislation
desc: Download and analyse The National Archives of the UK Legislation. A Drupal build with a number of custom PHP modules.

title: FCA Handbook
desc: Navigate through the Hanbook Rules and regulations. Interact with the timeline and glossary defintion features to enhance your browsing

title: Smirnoff Mould
desc: An AngularJS application for users to claim a free ice mould.

title: Doctors Mess
desc: A food blog full of heathly dinners and tasty treats. Built using Wordpress to allow for simple content management.

title: Croydon Intranet
desc: Croydon Council's internal website, built for user and event management using Drupal.

title: BP Offline Product
desc: An offline version of the British Pharmacopoeia website. Built using NWjs, this creates an application that can be installed to your desktop.

title: BSI
desc: Development platform for the British Standards Institute, featuring AngularJS.
